Package reachabilityGraphLayout

Class AbstractLayoutRectangle

java.lang.Object
reachabilityGraphLayout.AbstractLayoutRectangle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<AbstractLayoutRectangle>, LayoutPointInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
LayoutEdge, LayoutNode, LayoutRectangle
public abstract class AbstractLayoutRectangle extends Object implements Comparable<AbstractLayoutRectangle>, LayoutPointInterface

Class defining methods for a rectangle (and implementing some).

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(AbstractLayoutRectangle other)
      Compares the centers of two rectangles primarily by their x value and secondarily by the y value.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<AbstractLayoutRectangle>
      Parameters:
      other - the other rectangle
      Returns:
      -1 if left/lower, 1 if right/upper, 0 if the same
